AppImageConfigArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AppImageConfig.
AppImageConfigArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AppImageConfig.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: arn:aws[a-z\-]*:sagemaker:[a-z0-9\-]*:[0-9]{12}:app-image-config/.*  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

AppImageConfigName.markdownDescription:
The Name of the AppImageConfig.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 63  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9](-*[a-zA-Z0-9]){0,62}  
Update requires: Replacement
